full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 GREATER BOSTON LEGAL SERVICE 68 ESSEX STREET BOSTON, MASSACHUSETTS 02111 CERTIFIED MAIL , 617-357-5757 617-720-4285 (TDD) November 10, 1987 Charles Cobb District Director Immigration and Naturalization Services Room 700, JFK Federal Building Boston MA 02203 Re: Rosegarcon Petit File No. A26 875 947 Dear Mr. Cobb: Earlier today I received notification that a Motion to Reconsider submitted by me on behalf of the above individual had been denied. The notification, a copy of which is en- closed, states that you did not at any time receive documen- tation which had been previously requested. On August 7, 1987 I wrote a letter to travel control requesting additional time to submit the requested information. On October 6, 1987, when all the requested information was available, I wrote a letter to Travel Control enclosing the requested documentation. Copies of my letters are en- closed. In addition, the Motion to Reconsider contained other documentation in response to your earlier concerns. I am, therefore, asking that your recent decision be recon- sidered. If it is necessary for me to resubmit any of the documents mentioned above please let me know. Thank you for your consideration. Very truly yours, Gerald D. Wall Attorney GDW/mg Enclosures
